alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Lee; Prentiss; Tippah; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 4:51PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN UNION...NORTHERN LEE... SOUTHERN TIPPAH...PRENTISS AND SOUTHWESTERN ALCORN COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM CST... At 451 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Keownville, or 9 miles south of Ripley, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Booneville, New Albany, Ripley, Baldwyn, Guntown, Blue Mountain, Jumpertown, Thrashers, Hinkle, Keownville, Wheeler, Blair, Dumas, Rienzi, Marietta, Shari, Murry, Graham, Jericho, and Branyan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for northeastern Mississippi. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until midnight CST for northeastern Mississippi.
